column2: South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands

column1: New Economics Foundation: Happy Planet Index, 2016

"The Happy Planet Index (HPI) is a measure of sustainable wellbeing. It compares how efficiently residents of different countries are using natural resources to achieve long, high wellbeing lives. [...]
Happy Planet Index ≈ [( Life expectancy x Experienced wellbeing ) x Inequality of outcomes]/[Ecological Footprint]" (Description taken from the methods paper available at https://static1.squarespace.com/static/5735c421e321402778ee0ce9/t/578dec7837c58157b929b3d6/1468918904805/Methods+paper_2016.pdf)
Countries with empty data fields are not considered in the cartogram.
